FuncDef:
The set flow-change-ratio threshold command specifies the percentage threshold for triggering a flow-change-alarm.
The undo set flow-change-ratio threshold command restores the default setting. The set flow-change-ratio threshold command specifies the percentage threshold for triggering a flow-change-alarm. The undo set flow-change-ratio threshold command restores the default setting. By default, the threshold for triggering a flow-change-alarm is 50%.
CLIs: undo set flow-change-ratio { input-threshold | output-threshold } upper-limit [ <threshold-value> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Configure the threshold of the traffic change proportion that triggers a traffic change alarm in the inbound direction.
-

Configure the threshold of the traffic change proportion that triggers a traffic change alarm in the outbound direction.
-

Configure the threshold of the traffic change proportion that triggers a traffic change alarm on a specified interface.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 100, in percentage. The default value is 50.
